trans-unit.source: Represents a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 表示要對 SQL Server 資料庫執行的 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> is created, the read/write properties are set to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>建立時，讀取/寫入屬性會設定為其初始值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需這些值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> features the following methods for executing commands at a SQL Server database:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> 下列方法來執行命令，在 SQL Server 資料庫的功能如下：

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, generally executing commands such as INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.
trans-unit.target: 起始非同步執行的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序所描述<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>通常執行命令，例如 INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE、、 和 SET 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> must be paired with a call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>必須搭配呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>的完成作業，通常在另一個執行緒上的。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and retrieves one or more results sets from the server.
trans-unit.target: 起始非同步執行的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序所描述<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>和一或多個結果集從伺服器擷取。

trans-unit.source: Each call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> must be paired with a call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>必須搭配呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>的完成作業，通常在另一個執行緒上的。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 起始這個 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: Each call to `BeginExecuteXmlReader` must be paired with a call to `EndExecuteXmlReader`, which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread, and returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫`BeginExecuteXmlReader`必須搭配呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`，會完成作業，通常位於個別的執行緒，並傳回<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件。

trans-unit.source: Executes commands that return rows.
trans-unit.target: 執行傳回資料列的命令。

trans-unit.source: For increased performance, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> invokes commands using the Transact-SQL `sp_executesql` system stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高效能，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>叫用命令使用 Transact SQL`sp_executesql`系統預存程序。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> might not have the effect that you want if used to execute commands such as Transact-SQL SET statements.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>可能沒有您想要使用的效果來執行命令，例如 TRANSACT-SQL SET 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Executes commands such as Transact-SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令，例如 TRANSACT-SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE 和 SET 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: 從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A> and builds an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> 傳送至 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A> 並建置 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 物件。

trans-unit.source: You can reset the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property and reuse the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重設<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性和重複使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, you must close the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> before you can execute a new or previous command.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您必須先關閉<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>之前可以執行新的或上一個命令。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is generated by the method executing a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> remains open when the severity level is 19 or less.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>所執行的方法產生<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>仍保持開啟時的嚴重性層級為 19 或更少。

trans-unit.source: When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器的嚴重性層級 20 或以上時，通常會關閉<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。

trans-unit.source: Nameless, also called ordinal, parameters are not supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 沒有名稱，也稱為 序數，不支援參數由.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server。

trans-unit.target: 此範例會讀取整個資料，寫入至主控台。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example closes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> and then the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> as it exits the `Using` code blocks.
trans-unit.target: 最後，範例會關閉<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>然後<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>時便會結束`Using`的程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 起始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 起始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns the number of affected rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。叫用傳回受影響資料列數目的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement or stored procedure that does not return rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行的程序[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]陳述式或預存程序不會傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method to finish the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法，以完成該操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method returns immediately (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> has no effect on <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>), but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法會立即傳回 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>對<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>)，但是直到執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫針對相同<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.IAsyncResult>。

trans-unit.source: The following console application creates updates data within the **AdventureWorks** sample database, doing its work asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式會建立內的更新資料**AdventureWorks**範例資料庫中，以非同步方式執行其工作。

trans-unit.source: In order to emulate a long-running process, this example inserts a WAITFOR statement in the command text.
trans-unit.target: 為了模擬長期執行的處理序，此範例會將 WAITFOR 陳述式插入命令文字中。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you would not take efforts to make your commands run slower, but doing this in this case makes it easier to demonstrate the asynchronous behavior.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不需要花費努力讓命令執行速度變慢，但在此情況下這樣做可以更容易示範非同步行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: Any error that occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生的任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A timeout occurred during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 串流作業期間發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name/value pair "Asynchronous Processing=true" was not included within the connection string defining the connection for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 之連接的連接字串中未包含名稱/值組 "Asynchronous Processing=true"。

trans-unit.target: 在串流作業期間已關閉或卸除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object was closed during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間已關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that is invoked when the command's execution has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成執行命令時叫用的 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Pass <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic) to indicate that no callback is required.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 <see langword="null" /> (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />) 以表示不需要回呼。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 已傳遞至回呼程序的使用者定義狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve this object from within the callback procedure using the <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> 屬性，從回呼程序內擷取這個物件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />, given a callback procedure and state information.
trans-unit.target: 如果已有回呼程序和狀態資訊，會啟始 Transact-SQL 陳述式或此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns the number of affected rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。叫用傳回受影響資料列數目的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that does not return rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序不會傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method to finish the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法，以完成該操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method returns immediately (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> has no effect on <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>), but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法會立即傳回 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>對<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>)，但是直到執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫針對相同<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter lets you specify an <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is called when the statement has completed.
trans-unit.target: `callback`參數可讓您指定<xref:System.AsyncCallback>陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can pass any object in the `asyncStateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`asyncStateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Because the callback procedure executes from within a background thread supplied by the Microsoft .NET common language runtime, it is very important that you take a rigorous approach to handling cross-thread interactions from within your applications.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Microsoft.NET common language runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure; should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您不能與互動表單的內容，從回呼程序; 內您一定要更新的表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。

trans-unit.source: All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application.
trans-unit.target: 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。

trans-unit.source: The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of several seconds (emulating a long-running command).
trans-unit.target: 下列 Windows 應用程式示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>執行包含數個秒延遲 （模擬長時間執行命令） 的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates many important techniques.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。

trans-unit.source: This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。

trans-unit.source: To set up this example, create a new Windows application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control on the form (accepting the default name for each control).
trans-unit.target: Put<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 之連接的連接字串中未包含名稱/值組 "Asynchronous Processing=true"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> closed or dropped during a streaming operation.

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object was closed during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間已關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />, and retrieves one or more result sets from the server.
trans-unit.target: 起始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並從伺服器擷取一或多個結果集。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />, and retrieves one or more result sets from the server.
trans-unit.target: 起始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並從伺服器擷取一或多個結果集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> instance that can be used to retrieve the returned rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)；叫用 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 以傳回可用以擷取所傳回資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 執行個體時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法來完成該操作並擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>命令所傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks.
trans-unit.target: 這表示呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.IAsyncResult>。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following console application starts the process of retrieving a data reader asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取的資料讀取器程序。

trans-unit.source: While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: As soon as the process has completed, the code retrieves the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> and displays its contents.
trans-unit.target: 一旦完成程序程式碼會擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>並顯示其內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values, indicating options for statement execution and data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值，表示陳述式執行和資料擷取的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> using one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值，起始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll, wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> instance that can be used to retrieve the returned rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)；叫用 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> (會傳回可用以擷取所傳回資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 執行個體) 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法來完成該操作並擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>命令所傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `behavior` parameter lets you specify options that control the behavior of the command and its connection.
trans-unit.target: `behavior`參數可讓您指定選項以控制命令和其連線的行為。

trans-unit.source: These values can be combined together (using the programming language's `OR` operator); generally, developers use the `CommandBehavior.CloseConnection` value to make sure that the connection is closed by the runtime when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以合併在一起 (使用的程式設計語言`OR`運算子)，一般而言，開發人員使用`CommandBehavior.CloseConnection`值，以確定此連接由執行階段關閉時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks.
trans-unit.target: 這表示呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.IAsyncResult>。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following console application starts the process of retrieving a data reader asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取的資料讀取器程序。

trans-unit.source: While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Once the process has completed, the code retrieves the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> and displays its contents.
trans-unit.target: 當處理程序完成之後時，程式碼會擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>並顯示其內容。

trans-unit.source: This example also passes the `CommandBehavior.CloseConnection` and `CommandBehavior.SingleRow` values in the behavior parameter, causing the connection to be closed with the returned <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> is closed, and to optimize for a single row result.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會傳遞`CommandBehavior.CloseConnection`和`CommandBehavior.SingleRow`行為的參數，造成關閉的連接中的值並傳回<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>已關閉，並針對單一資料列結果進行最佳化。

trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that is invoked when the command's execution has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成執行命令時叫用的 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Pass <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic) to indicate that no callback is required.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 <see langword="null" /> (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />) 以表示不需要回呼。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 已傳遞至回呼程序的使用者定義狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve this object from within the callback procedure using the <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> 屬性，從回呼程序內擷取這個物件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> and retrieves one or more result sets from the server, given a callback procedure and state information.
trans-unit.target: 指定回呼程序和狀態資訊時，啟始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並且從伺服器擷取一個或多個結果集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll, wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> instance which can be used to retrieve the returned rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。叫用 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> (傳回一個可用於擷取所傳回資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 執行個體) 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法來完成該操作並擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>命令所傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed cause the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>完成執行命令之前原因<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter lets you specify an <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is called when the statement has completed.
trans-unit.target: `callback`參數可讓您指定<xref:System.AsyncCallback>陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks.
trans-unit.target: 這表示呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Because the callback procedure executes from within a background thread supplied by the Microsoft .NET runtime, it is very important that you take a rigorous approach to handling cross-thread interactions from within your applications.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Microsoft.NET runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure; should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您不能與互動表單的內容，從回呼程序; 內您一定要更新的表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。

trans-unit.source: All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application.
trans-unit.target: 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of a few seconds (emulating a long-running command).
trans-unit.target: 下列 Windows 應用程式示範 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> 方法的用法，它會執行包含數秒延遲 (模擬長時間執行命令) 的 Transact-SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Because the sample executes the command asynchronously, the form remains responsive while awaiting the results.
trans-unit.target: 因為此範例會以非同步方式執行命令，表單在等待結果時仍然能夠保持回應。

trans-unit.source: This example passes the executing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object as the `stateObject` parameter; doing so makes it simple to retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method corresponding to the initial call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將執行<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件當做`stateObject`參數; 這樣可以方便擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法對應到初始呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates many important techniques.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。

trans-unit.source: This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。

trans-unit.source: To set up this example, create a new Windows application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control on the form (accepting the default name for each control).
trans-unit.target: Put<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: Any error that occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生的任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A timeout occurred during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 串流作業期間發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name/value pair "Asynchronous Processing=true" was not included within the connection string defining the connection for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 之連接的連接字串中未包含名稱/值組 "Asynchronous Processing=true"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> closed or dropped during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 在串流作業期間已關閉或卸除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object was closed during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間已關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that is invoked when the command's execution has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成執行命令時叫用的 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Pass <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic) to indicate that no callback is required.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 <see langword="null" /> (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />) 以表示不需要回呼。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 已傳遞至回呼程序的使用者定義狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve this object from within the callback procedure using the <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> 屬性，從回呼程序內擷取這個物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values, indicating options for statement execution and data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值，表示陳述式執行和資料擷取的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />, using one of the <see langword="CommandBehavior" /> values, and retrieving one or more result sets from the server, given a callback procedure and state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一個 <see langword="CommandBehavior" /> 值、從伺服器擷取一個或多個結果集，以及指定回呼程序和狀態資訊，啟始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" />, which returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> instance which can be used to retrieve the returned rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。叫用 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> (傳回一個可用於擷取所傳回資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 執行個體) 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法來完成該操作並擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>命令所傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter lets you specify an <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is called when the statement has completed.
trans-unit.target: `callback`參數可讓您指定<xref:System.AsyncCallback>陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `behavior` parameter lets you specify options that control the behavior of the command and its connection.
trans-unit.target: `behavior`參數可讓您指定選項以控制命令和其連線的行為。

trans-unit.source: These values can be combined together (using the programming language's `Or` operator); generally, developers use the `CloseConnection` value to make sure that the connection is closed by the runtime when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以合併在一起 (使用的程式設計語言`Or`運算子)，一般而言，開發人員使用`CloseConnection`值，以確定此連接由執行階段關閉時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Developers can also optimize the behavior of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> by specifying the `SingleRow` value when it is known in advance that the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure only returns a single row.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員也可以最佳化的行為<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>藉由指定`SingleRow`時它會事先知道的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序只傳回單一資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。

trans-unit.source: This means that calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks.
trans-unit.target: 這表示呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。

trans-unit.target: 因為 Microsoft.NET common language runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure--should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您不能互動與來自您回呼程序中的表單的內容應該更新表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。

trans-unit.target: 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。

trans-unit.target: 因為此範例會以非同步方式執行命令，表單在等待結果時仍然能夠保持回應。

trans-unit.source: This example passes the executing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object as the `stateObject` parameter; doing so makes it simple to retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method corresponding to the initial call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將執行<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件當做`stateObject`參數; 這樣可以方便擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法對應到初始呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates many important techniques.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。

trans-unit.source: This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。

trans-unit.source: To set up this example, create a new Windows application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control on the form (accepting the default name for each control).
trans-unit.target: Put<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> and returns results as an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 啟始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並傳回結果做為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> and returns results as an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 啟始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並傳回結果做為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking <see langword="EndExecuteXmlReader" />, which returns a single XML value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。叫用傳回單一 XML 值的 <see langword="EndExecuteXmlReader" /> 時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement that returns rows as XML, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式會傳回為 XML，資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the `EndExecuteXmlReader` method to finish the operation and retrieve the XML returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`命令所傳回的方法來完成該操作並擷取的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding `EndExecuteXmlReader` method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應`EndExecuteXmlReader`方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the `EndExecuteXmlReader` before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property ordinarily specifies a Transact-SQL statement with a valid FOR XML clause.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性通常指定有效的 FOR XML 子句的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: However, `CommandText` can also specify a statement that returns `ntext` data that contains valid XML.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`CommandText`也可以指定傳回的陳述式`ntext`包含有效的 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> query can be formatted as in the following C# example:
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集。

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the `EndExecuteXmlReader` method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，`EndExecuteXmlReader`方法會附加至<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature lets multiple actions use the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作，使用相同的連接。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers need to either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已完成命令，使用這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員需要任一輪詢<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法; 或完成的等候一或多個命令使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.IAsyncResult>。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取 XML 資料的程序。

trans-unit.source: While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Once the process has completed, the code retrieves the XML and displays its contents.
trans-unit.target: 處理程序完成後，請將程式碼會擷取的 XML，並顯示其內容。
