trans-unit.source: A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 已傳遞至回呼程序的使用者定義狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve this object from within the callback procedure using the <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState" /> 屬性，從回呼程序內擷取這個物件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> and returns results as an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object, using a callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 使用回呼程序，啟始這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行，並傳回結果做為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that can be used to poll, wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when the <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> is called, which returns the results of the command as XML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)。此外，叫用以 XML 傳回 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 的命令結果時，也需要這個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows as XML, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列做為 XML，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the requested XML data.
trans-unit.target: 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法來完成該操作並擷取要求的 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>命令執行已完成的原因之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property ordinarily specifies a Transact-SQL statement with a valid FOR XML clause.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性通常指定有效的 FOR XML 子句的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: However, `CommandText` can also specify a statement that returns data that contains valid XML.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`CommandText`也可以指定傳回包含有效的 XML 資料的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集。

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會附加至<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> query can be formatted as in the following C# example:
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集。

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會附加至<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature lets multiple actions use the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作，使用相同的連接。

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter lets you specify an <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is called when the statement has completed.
trans-unit.target: `callback`參數可讓您指定<xref:System.AsyncCallback>陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters is sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。

trans-unit.source: All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application.
trans-unit.target: 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of a few seconds (emulating a long-running command).
trans-unit.target: 下列 Windows 應用程式示範 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> 方法的用法，它會執行包含數秒延遲 (模擬長時間執行命令) 的 Transact-SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This example passes the executing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object as the `stateObject` parameter--doing so makes it simple to retrieve the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method corresponding to the initial call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將執行<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件當做`stateObject`參數-如此一來您輕鬆地擷取<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法對應到初始呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates many important techniques.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。

trans-unit.source: This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。

trans-unit.source: To set up this example, create a new Windows application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control on the form (accepting the default name for each control).
trans-unit.target: Put<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: Any error that occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生的任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A timeout occurred during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 串流作業期間發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name/value pair "Asynchronous Processing=true" was not included within the connection string defining the connection for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 之連接的連接字串中未包含名稱/值組 "Asynchronous Processing=true"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> closed or dropped during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 在串流作業期間已關閉或卸除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object was closed during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間已關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: Tries to cancel the execution of a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取消 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 的執行。

trans-unit.source: If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有要取消的作業，則不會發生任何狀況。

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: In some, rare, cases, if you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> then call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A> (implicitily or explicitly) before calling <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>, and then call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>, the cancel command will not be sent to SQL Server and the result set can continue to stream after you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在某些罕見的情況下，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>然後呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A>(implicitily 或明確) 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>、 取消命令不會傳送到 SQL Server 和結果集可以繼續將串流處理之後呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this, make sure that you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A> before closing the reader or connection.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請確定您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>之前關閉讀取器或連接。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體複本的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個新執行個體複本的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column encryption setting for this command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個命令的資料行加密設定。

trans-unit.source: The column encryption setting for this command.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的資料行加密設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Transact-SQL statement, table name or stored procedure to execute at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在資料來源執行的 Transact-SQL 陳述式、資料表名稱或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.
trans-unit.target: 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個`Execute`方法。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a Transact-SQL statement or a stored procedure called by a command of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置來傳遞參數至 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序呼叫的命令`CommandType.Text`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定結束執行命令的嘗試並產生錯誤之前的等待時間。

trans-unit.source: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit (an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely).
trans-unit.target: 值為 0 表示無限制 （嘗試執行命令會無限期等候）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> property will be ignored during asynchronous method calls such as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>屬性將忽略在非同步方法呼叫期間例如<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> has no effect when the command is executed against a context connection (a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> opened with "context connection=true" in the connection string).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> 針對內容連接執行命令時沒有任何作用 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>以開啟 「 內容連接 = true"的連接字串中)。

trans-unit.source: This property is the cumulative time-out (for all network packets that are read during the invocation of a method) for all network reads during command execution or processing of the results.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是命令執行或是結果的處理期間的所有網路讀取累計的逾時 （適用於所有的網路封包方法引動過程會讀取）。

trans-unit.source: A time-out can still occur after the first row is returned, and does not include user processing time, only network read time.
trans-unit.target: 第一個資料列會傳回，而且不包含使用者的處理時間之後，仍然可能發生逾時，只有網路讀取時間。

trans-unit.source: For example, with a 30 second time out, if <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> requires two network packets, then it has 30 seconds to read both network packets.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，與 30 秒鐘的時間時，如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>需要兩個網路封包，則它必須使用 30 秒內讀取兩者的網路封包。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> again, it will have another 30 seconds to read any data that it requires.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>同樣地，它會有讀取所需的任何資料的另一個 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> property is to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，其表示解譯 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> 屬性的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Text" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Text" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>預存程序名稱的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫其中一個執行方法時，命令會執行這個預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a SQL Statement or a stored procedure called with a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> of <xref:System.Data.CommandType.Text>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或預存程序呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>的<xref:System.Data.CommandType.Text>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID
trans-unit.target: 選取 * FROM Customers，CustomerID = @CustomerID

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: The value was not a valid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> used by this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 的這個執行個體所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: The connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的連接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the command is enlisted in an existing transaction, and the connection is changed, trying to execute the command will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此命令會登記在現有交易中，連接即會變更，嘗試執行此命令將會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> property is not null and the transaction has already been committed or rolled back, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> is set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> 屬性不是 null，且交易已經認可或回復，則 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> 會設定為 null。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> property was changed while the command was enlisted in a transaction..
trans-unit.target: 當此命令已在交易中登記時，<see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> 屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter" /> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CreateParameter%2A> method is a strongly-typed version of <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CreateParameter%2A>方法是強類型版本的<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a Windows Form Designer control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出命令物件是否應該在 Windows Form 設計工具控制項中顯示。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a control.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出命令物件是否應該顯示在控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**true**。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned by the call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 所傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" />。

trans-unit.source: Finishes asynchronous execution of a Transact-SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 完成 Transact-SQL 陳述式的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected (the same behavior as <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />).
trans-unit.target: 受影響的資料列數目 (與 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> 相同的行為)。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> to execute a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement, you must call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> in order to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>執行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]陳述式中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>才能完成作業。

trans-unit.source: If the process of executing the command has not yet finished, this method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行命令的處理程序尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that the command has completed its operation by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以確認命令已完成其作業，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a callback procedure was specified in the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>, this method must be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定回呼程序，在呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>，必須呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For examples demonstrating the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A> method, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 null (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was called more than once for a single command execution, or the method was mismatched against its execution method (for example, the code called <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> to complete execution of a call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫多次 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來執行單一命令，或方法不符合其執行方法 (例如程式碼呼叫了 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來完成執行 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" /> 呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time specified in <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> elapsed and the asynchronous operation specified with <see cref="Overload:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" /> is not complete.
trans-unit.target: 過了 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> 中指定的時間且以 <see cref="Overload:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" /> 指定的非同步作業未完成。

trans-unit.source: In some situations, <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> can be set to <see langword="IsCompleted" /> incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，<see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 可能不正確地設定為 <see langword="IsCompleted" />。

trans-unit.source: If this occurs and <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" /> is called, EndExecuteNonQuery could raise a SqlException error if the amount of time specified in <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> elapsed and the asynchronous operation specified with <see cref="Overload:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" /> is not complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生這種情況並呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteNonQuery(System.IAsyncResult)" />，在過了 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> 中指定的時間且以 <see cref="Overload:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" /> 指定的非同步作業未完成時，EndExecuteNonQuery 可能會引發 SqlException 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: To correct this situation, you should either increase the value of CommandTimeout or reduce the work being done by the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要更正這種情況，您應該增加 CommandTimeout 的值，或減少非同步作業所要完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned by the call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 所傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Finishes asynchronous execution of a Transact-SQL statement, returning the requested <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 完成 Transact-SQL 陳述式的非同步執行，傳回要求的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> object that can be used to retrieve the requested rows.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 物件，可用於擷取要求的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to execute a Transact-SQL statement, you must call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> in order to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>才能完成作業。

trans-unit.source: If the process of executing the command has not yet finished, this method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行命令的處理程序尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that the command has completed its operation by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以確認命令已完成其作業，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a callback procedure was specified in the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>, this method must be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定回呼程序，在呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>，必須呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For examples demonstrating the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A> method, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 null (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was called more than once for a single command execution, or the method was mismatched against its execution method (for example, the code called <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> to complete execution of a call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 多次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來執行單一命令，或方法不符合其執行方法 (例如程式碼呼叫了 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來完成執行 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" /> 呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned by the call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 所傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Finishes asynchronous execution of a Transact-SQL statement, returning the requested data as XML.
trans-unit.target: 完成 Transact-SQL 陳述式的非同步執行，以 XML 傳回要求的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that can be used to fetch the resulting XML data.
trans-unit.target: 可用來擷取所產生之 XML 資料的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to execute a Transact-SQL statement, you must call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> in order to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>才能完成作業。

trans-unit.source: If the process of executing the command has not yet finished, this method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行命令的處理程序尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that the command has completed its operation by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以確認命令已完成其作業，使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult>所傳回的執行個體<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a callback procedure was specified in the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>, this method must be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定回呼程序，在呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>，必須呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For examples demonstrating the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Microsoft Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 null (在 Microsoft Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was called more than once for a single command execution, or the method was mismatched against its execution method (for example, the code called <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> to complete execution of a call to <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" />.
trans-unit.target: 多次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來執行單一命令，或方法不符合其執行方法 (例如程式碼呼叫了 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 來完成執行 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery" /> 呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: Executes a Transact-SQL statement against the connection and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 針對連接執行 Transact-SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表），或變更資料庫中的資料，而不使用<xref:System.Data.DataSet>藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>會傳回任何資料列時，任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: When a trigger exists on a table being inserted or updated, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers.
trans-unit.target: 當觸發程序會存在於資料表所插入或更新的範圍時，則傳回值包括受到 insert 或 update 作業以及由觸發程序或觸發程序影響的資料列數目的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要進行復原，傳回值也是-1。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and then executes it using <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>，然後執行它使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example is passed a string that is a Transact-SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會傳遞 （例如 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE） 的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式的字串，用來連接到資料來源的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while executing the command against a locked row.
trans-unit.target: 對鎖定的資料列執行命令時發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not generated when you are using Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Microsoft .NET Framework 1.0 版時不會產生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A timeout occurred during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 串流作業期間發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取消指令。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />, which executes a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement against the connection and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 非同步版本的 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />，這個版本會對連接執行 [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元可用於要求在命令逾時之前捨棄作業。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況將經由傳回的 Task 物件回報。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Binary** or **VarBinary** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 時，使用 **Binary** 或 **VarBinary** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Char**, **NChar**, **NVarChar**, **VarChar**, or **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設為 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 時，使用 **Char**、**NChar**、**NVarChar**、**VarChar** 或 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" /> other than **Xml** was used when <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> was set to <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Value" /> 設定為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 時，使用 **Xml** 以外的 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SqlDbType" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> more than once for the same instance before task completion.
trans-unit.target: 在工作完成前，對同一個執行個體呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> 不止一次。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> closed or dropped during a streaming operation.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Context Connection=true" /> is specified in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 在連接字串中指定了 <see langword="Context Connection=true" />。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server returned an error while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 於執行命令文字時傳回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A timeout occurred during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: 串流作業期間發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> and builds a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> 傳送至 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" />，並建置 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> and builds a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> 傳送至 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" />，並建置 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction is deadlocked, an exception may not be thrown until <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果交易發生死結時，可能不會擲回例外狀況之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作使用相同的連接。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, and then executes it by passing a string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>，然後執行它，藉由傳遞字串，是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式和用來連接到資料來源的字串。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while executing the command against a locked row.
trans-unit.target: 對鎖定的資料列執行命令時發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not generated when you are using Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Microsoft .NET Framework 1.0 版時不會產生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The current state of the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 連接目前的狀態已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader" /> requires an open <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object was closed during a streaming operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />、<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件在串流作業期間已關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需串流的詳細資訊，請參閱 [SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" />, and builds a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> using one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> 傳送至 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" />，並使用其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值來建置 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess> to retrieve large values and binary data.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess>擷取二進位資料並將較大的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> might occur and the connection will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>可能會發生，連接將會關閉。

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作使用相同的連接。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations that you need to generate the single value using the data returned by a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: 這需要較少的程式碼比使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法，並接著執行作業，您需要產生單一值使用所傳回的資料<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>，然後執行它使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example is passed a string representing a new value to be inserted into a table, and a string to use to connect to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會傳遞字串，表示要插入至資料表時，新的值，用來連接到資料來源的字串。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> and builds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText" /> 傳送至 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection" /> 並建置 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property ordinarily specifies a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement with a valid FOR XML clause.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性通常會指定[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]具有有效的 FOR XML 子句的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> can also specify a statement that returns `ntext` or `nvarchar` data that contains valid XML, or the contents of a column defined with the `xml` data type.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>也可以指定傳回的陳述式`ntext`或`nvarchar`包含有效的 XML 或與定義的資料行的內容資料`xml`資料型別。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> query can be formatted as in the following Microsoft Visual C# example:
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>查詢可以進行格式化，如下列的 Microsoft Visual C# 範例所示：

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set that contains XML data.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集，其中包含 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>方法會附加至<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作使用相同的連接。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>讀取 FOR XML 查詢。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and then executes it using <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>，然後執行它使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest" /> object bound to this command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定繫結至這個命令的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When set to null (default), no notification should be requested.
trans-unit.target: 設為 null (預設值) 時，不應要求任何告知。

trans-unit.source: You must set the value for this property before the command is executed for it to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先設定此屬性的值，才能執行命令，才會生效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should automatically receive query notifications from a common <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否應該從通用 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> 物件自動接收查詢告知。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the application should automatically receive query notifications; otherwise **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果應用程式應該自動接收查詢通知，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**true**。

trans-unit.source: This feature is used in ASP.NET applications to receive notifications for all commands executed in an ASP page against SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能用於 ASP.NET 應用程式中，以接收通知之所有 ASP 網頁對 SQL Server 中執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: This enables ASP.NET to cache the page until the queries used to render the page would produce a different result.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓 ASP.NET 快取的頁面，直到用來呈現頁面的查詢會產生不同的結果。

trans-unit.source: Automatic enlistment.
trans-unit.target: 自動登記。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to versions of SQL Server that support query notifications.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於支援查詢通知的 SQL Server 版本。

trans-unit.source: For earlier versions, setting this property to **true** has no effect on the application.
trans-unit.target: 針對先前的版本，此屬性設定為**true**對應用程式沒有影響。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的參數。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空集合。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by a command of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或預存程序呼叫的命令`CommandType.Text`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID
trans-unit.target: 選取 * FROM Customers，CustomerID = @CustomerID

trans-unit.source: If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中的參數不符合查詢的需求，要執行，可能會產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and add parameters to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>並加入參數，以便<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a prepared version of the command on an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 的執行個體上建立命令的預備版本。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> should succeed, although it may cause a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>設`StoredProcedure`，呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>應該會成功，但它可能會不造成任何作業。

trans-unit.source: Before you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>, specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared.
trans-unit.target: 之前先呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>，先備妥的陳述式中指定的每個參數的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A> property to the maximum size needed.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個參數具有可變長度資料類型，您必須設定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>屬性所需的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> returns an error if these conditions are not met.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> 如果不符合這些條件會傳回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the database context is changed by executing the Transact-SQL `USE <database>` statement, or by calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method, then <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> must be called a second time.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將資料庫內容變更藉由執行 TRANSACT-SQL`USE <database>`陳述式，或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法，然後<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>必須呼叫第二次。

trans-unit.source: If you call an `Execute` method after calling <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>, any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A> property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫`Execute`方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>，任何大於所指定的值的參數值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>屬性會自動被截斷成原始的指定大小的參數，而且沒有截斷錯誤傳回。

trans-unit.source: Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數 （不論是否已備妥） 必須是使用者指定的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的可變長度資料類型，您也必須指定最大值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Prior to Visual Studio 2010, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> threw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 2010 之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Visual Studio 2010, this method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 從 Visual Studio 2010 開始，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Prepare%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout" /> 屬性為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the execution of a Transact-SQL statement completes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 Transact-SQL 陳述式執行完畢時。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體複本的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個新執行個體複本的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" /> within which the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中執行 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性，如果它已設定為特定值，而且命令正在執行。

trans-unit.source: If you set the transaction property to a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction> object that is not connected to the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, an exception is thrown the next time that you attempt to execute a statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定交易屬性<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>未連線到相同的物件<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>為<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>物件時，下次您嘗試執行陳述式擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how command results are applied to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> when used by the **Update** method of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當由 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" /> 的 **Update** 方法使用命令結果時，如何套用至 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>), in which case the default is **None**.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>值是**兩者**除非命令會自動產生 (如果是做為<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>)，預設值是在此情況下**無**。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the **UpdatedRowSource** property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用**UpdatedRowSource**屬性，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。
